Key Match Events: Michael Harris II made a spectacular home run-robbing catch in the 3-0 loss to the Philadelphia Phillies.
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker praised Harris' catch, calling it a 'God-given ability' and'must-see TV'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The catch was described as one of the best in Harris' young career and possibly the best catch at Citizens Bank Park since its opening in 2004.
Others: The Braves' loss pushed their National League East lead to six games over the second-place Phillies.
